our_commitment_p2: Le nqubomgomo isebenza kuwo wonke amasayithi nezinhlelo zokusebenza ze-VRNL lapho ithunyelwe khona, ngokuhambisana nemithetho efanele ezindaweni esisebenza kuzo. Izaziso ezengeziwe zobumfihlo ezingezona izifunda noma izinsizakalo zingahambisana nale nqubomgomo.
our_commitment_p3: Uma unikeza ulwazi ngezinkundla zabanye (isb., ukungena ngemidiya yokuxhumana), siqoqa idatha ngokusebenzisa lezo zixhumanisi ngaphansi kwale nqubomgomo. Kodwa-ke, izinqubo zobumfihlo zomuntu wesithathu ziqondisa idatha abayiqoqayo ngqo. Izilungiselelo zobumfihlo kulezo zinkundla azithinti indlela i-VRNL esebenzisa ngayo idatha eqoqwe ngamasayithi noma izinhlelo zethu.
our_commitment_p4: Amapulatifomu ethu angase aqukathe izixhumanisi eziholela kumasayithi angaphandle angabi ngaphansi kwe-VRNL. Asibophekeleli ngezindlela zabo zobumfihlo futhi sikukhuthaza ukuthi ubuyekeze izinqubomgomo zabo ngaphambi kokwabelana ngolwazi.
our_commitment_p5: Le Nqubomgomo Yobumfihlo kufanele ifundwe kanye nemigomo yethu yokusetshenziswa.
user_content_para: Ngokusebenzisa insizakalo ye-vrnl (isb., uma ubhalisa i-akhawunti, uthenga insiza, ungena emqhudelwaneni noma ukukhushulwa, uxhumana nathi, kumasayithi noma ezinhlelweni zethu), uyavuma ukuqoqa, ukusebenzisa nokwabelana ngolwazi lwakho lomuntu siqu njengoba kuchaziwe kule nqubomgomo. Kwezinye izimo, ikakhulukazi uma uhlala ezweni elibuswa umthetho wokuvikelwa kwedatha, singakucela imvume ecacile ukuze ufike ezinsizeni zethu ngaphambi kokuqhubeka. Uma kwenzeka ukuthi iphrofayela yomsebenzisi itholakala noma uhambele emazweni ahlukahlukene usebenzisa insizakalo ye-vrnl, sizothatha izwe obhalise kulo njengezwe lakho eliyinhloko futhi imvume etholakele ngesikhathi sokubhalisa izosebenza ekuhlolweni kolwazi lwakho. Lolu lwazi luhlanganisa, kodwa alugcini lapho:
info_auto_list:
• Imisebenzi ku-vrnl.net njengohlobo lwamakhasi abukwa, isikhathi esichithwa kumakhasi, imibuzo yokusesha njll.

info_auto_note: *Qaphela: Ukuze sithuthukise ulwazi lwakho, singase sisebenzise ama-cookies noma ubuchwepheshe obufanayo ukuze sikunikeze I-ID yomsebenzisi ehlukile futhi siqonde izintshisekelo zakho. Ama-cookies awuvezi ubuwena ngaphandle uma ukuhlinzeka ngolwazi ngokuzithandela, futhi awakwazi ukufinyelela idatha kudivayisi yakho. Abakhangisi bangabeka ama-cookies abo lapho uxhumana nezikhangiso zabo, okungalawulwa yithi. Siqoqa futhi ulwazi lobuchwepheshe njalo lapho usebenzisa izinhlelo zethu zokusebenza noma insiza kunoma yiluphi uhlelo olunokuxhumeka kwe-inthanethi.
inferred_info_desp: Singalandela ulwazi oluthile ngawe ngokusekelwe ekuziphatheni kwakho ku-vrnl.net. Sisebenzisa lolu lwazi ukwenza ucwaningo lwangaphakathi ngedemographiki, amadivayisi, izintshisekelo nokuziphatha kwabantu ukuze siqonde kangcono, sivikele futhi sinikeze abasebenzisi bethu. inferred_info_list:
Singaqoqa futhi Ulwazi Lwakho ukuze silandelele ukuziphatha nezintandokazi zomsebenzisi ngenhloso yokuhlaziya ngaphakathi nokucwaninga. Singasebenzisa ulwazi lwakho futhi:

(ii) Ukwenza ukuhlaziya nokucwaninga kwamakhasimende, ukunquma izintshisekelo zakho, ukubona okuqukethwe okuthengisa nokuhlaziya izindlela zokuthutha.
inferred_info_a_desp1: i-vrnl.net inezici eziningi ezivumela abasebenzisi/amalungu ukuthi baziveze futhi baxhumane nabanye abasebenzisi/amalungu. Ukusebenzisa kwakho lezi zici kanye nokudalula imininingwane yakho (isb. ikheli le-imeyili) ngalawa mathuluzi kuyingozi yakho, futhi i-vrnl.net ayinakho ukubophezela kulokho. Sigcina lolu lwazi uma kudingekile ukuxazulula izingxabano, ukunikeza ukwesekwa kwamakhasimende kanye nokuxazulula izinkinga njengoba kuvunyelwe ngumthetho. Kodwa-ke, asihlanganisi ulwazi lwakho lomuntu siqu nale mikhombandlela noma okuthunyelwe uma senza ukuhlaziywa okunjalo.

Le mibuzo ingakucela imininingwane yokuxhumana nemininingwane yezibalo (njengekhodi ye-ziphu, iminyaka, njll.). Sisebenzisa lolu lwazi ukwenza ulwazi lwakho ku-vrnl.net lwenziwe ngendlela yokuthi likunikeze okuqukethwe esikholwa ukuthi kungakuthokozisa futhi likhombise okuqukethwe ngokwezintandokazi zakho.

info_thirdparty_b_desp: Ngokusekelwe ekuthengeni kwakho iphakheji yokubhalisela, ozakwethu wesango lokukhokha angase aqoqe ulwazi mayelana nekhadi lakho lesikweletu/debhithi noma amanye ama-akhawunti asebhange kanye nekheli lakho lokukhokha. Lolu lwazi lugcinwa ozakwethu wesango lokukhokha. Isibonelo, Izinsizakalo zizosebenzisa ozakwethu besango lokukhokha ukuze bahlele futhi balungise ukukhokha imali yakho yokubhalisela ukuze uthole ukufinyelela. Qaphela ukuthi i-vrnl.net ayiqoqi ngokuqondile ulwazi lwezezimali olufana nekhadi lesikweletu noma ikhadi ledebhithi noma imininingwane ye-inthanethi ebhange kuwe. Labo ozakwethu besango lokukhokha abalawulwa yithi. Lapho uvakashela lezo zindawo zokukhokha wenza lokho ngobungozi bakho. Lezi zindawo zokukhokha zingase zibe nezinqubomgomo zazo zobumfihlo, ezisincoma ukuthi uzibuke uma uvakashela noma yiziphi. Asithathi imfanelo nganoma yini ngaleyo misebenzi yezinkampani zangaphandle noma izinqubomgomo zabo, futhi asiyisekeli. Sikhuthaza ukuthi ujwayelane nezitatimende zobumfihlo ezinikezwa yilezi zindawo zokukhokha ngaphambi kokuthi uhlinzeke ngolwazi ngawe noma ungene kunoma yiziphi izivumelwano nazo.
lawfulness_processing_desp1: i-vrnl.net izoqoqa futhi icubungule idatha yakho yomuntu kuphela lapho sinesizathu esisemthethweni. Izizathu ezisemthethweni zifaka phakathi ukuthola imvume yakho ecacile noma ukucubungula ngenxa 'yezintshisekelo ezifanele' lapho kudingekile ukuthi sikunikeze ukwesekwa kwamakhasimende noma izinsizakalo ezikhokhelwayo (isb. ukucubungula ulwazi lwakho ozakwethu besango lokukhokha).
lawfulness_processing_desp2: Sisebenzisa ulwazi ukunikeza, ukuhlaziya, ukuphatha, ukuthuthukisa nokwenza ngezifiso insiza yethu kanye nemizamo yokumaketha, ukucubungula ukubhaliswa kwakho, ama-oda akho, izinkokhelo zakho, nokuxhumana nawe ngezimo ezibalulwe ngezansi. Isibonelo, sisebenzisa ulwazi ukuze:
lawfulness_processing_list:
• sinqume izidingo zakho zephothifoliyo futhi sinikeze izincomo ezenziwe ngezifiso, amathiphu nezibikezelo ngezimo zemakethe, izexwayiso mayelana nezinguquko zemakethe nezibalo zezikali, zonke esikholwa ukuthi zizoba nesithakazelo kuwe;
  • ukuvimbela, ukubona nokuhlola imisebenzi engase ibe yingozi noma engekho emthethweni, kuhlanganise nokukhwabanisa;
  • ukuhlaziya nokuzwa izethameli zethu, ukuthuthukisa insiza yethu (kuhlanganise nolwazi lwesixhumi somsebenzisi) nokwenza ngcono ukukhethwa kokuqukethwe, ama-algorithm ezincomo nokulethwa;
  • ukuxhumana nawe mayelana nensiza yethu (isib. nge-imeyili, izaziso zokucindezela, imiyalezo ye-SMS, neziteshi zokuxhumana ku-inthanethi), ukuze sikunikeze izindaba mayelana ne-vrnl.net, imininingwane ngezici ezintsha nokuqukethwe okutholakala ku-vrnl.net, kanye nezipesheli, izimemezelo zokumaketha, imincintiswano nezibalo zamakhasimende, nokukusiza ngezicelo zokusebenza ezifana nezicelo zokubuyisela iphasiwedi.
  • ukukwazisa ngezinguquko ezimigomeni yokusebenza.
  • ukukuvumela ukuthi uhlanganyele ezicini zokusebenzisana ezinikezwa izinsiza zethu.
  • ukufeza izibopho zethu nokuphoqelela amalungelo ethu avela kunoma yiziphi izinkontileka ezisungulwe phakathi kwakho nathi, kuhlanganise nokukhokha, ukubuyisela imali nokukhokhisa.
lawfulness_processing_desp3: Singase sisebenzise ulwazi lwakho ukuze sikunikeze ulwazi olwenziwe ngezifiso lapho uvakashela/usebenzisa enye yezindawo zethu/ama-apps, kanye nezinhloso zokuqonda nokumaketha.
lawfulness_processing_desp4: Sihlinzeka ngokwenza ngezifiso sisebenzisa idatha oyihlinzeka kithi ngendlela yama-cookies, amakheli e-IP, amawebhu beacon noma ubuchwepheshe obufanayo obuhlobene namadivayisi owasebenzisa. Ngokwenza lokhu, singakunikeza okuqukethwe/izikhangiso esikholwa ukuthi zifanele kakhulu izintshisekelo zakho. Sicela unikeze imvume ecacile lapho siqoqa idatha yakho futhi/okanye ulungise izintandokazi zakho ku-akhawunti yakho mayelana nezinketho zakho.
info_usedBy_desp1: Ulwazi olunikezwe abasebenzisi lusivumela ukuthi sithuthukise Izinsiza futhi sikunikeze ulwazi olunobungane kakhulu. Kwezinye izimo, singadinga ikheli lakho lokuxhumana. Lonke ulwazi oludingekayo luxhomeke enkonzweni futhi Inkampani ingase isebenzise ulwazi lomsebenzisi olungenhla ukuze, igcine, ivikele futhi ithuthukise Izinsiza (kuhlanganise nokumaketha ku-'hlelo lokusebenza') nokuthuthukisa izinsiza ezintsha. Singase futhi sisebenzise ikheli lakho le-imeyili noma olunye ulwazi lokuhlonza ukuze sithumele imiyalezo yokumaketha ngemvume yakho, njengoba kudingwa ngumthetho wendawo [ngenketho yokubhalisela/ukuzikhipha (lapho kungenzeka)]. Kodwa-ke, singase sisebenzise ikheli lakho le-imeyili ngaphandle kwemvume eyengeziwe ngezinhloso ezingezona zokumaketha (isb. ukukwazisa ngezinguquko ezinkulu, ngezinhloso zenkonzo yamakhasimende, ukukhokha, njll.)
info_usedBy_desp2: Noma yiluphi ulwazi olukhomba wena uqobo olunikezwe nguwe ngeke lubhekwe njengoluyimfihlo uma lutholakala kalula futhi / noma lufinyeleleka esizindeni somphakathi njengamazwana, imilayezo, amablogi, noma okuthunyelwe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ezifana noFacebook, Twitter njll. Noma yini ethunyelwe/elayishiwe/idlulisiwe/ixoxiwe ngabasebenzisi ezingxenyeni zomphakathi zesayithi noma uhlelo lokusebenza iba okuqukethwe okushicilelwe futhi ayibhekwa njengolwazi olukhomba umuntu siqu ngaphansi kwale Nqubomgomo Yobumfihlo. Uma ukhetha ukwenqaba ukuhambisa ulwazi olukhomba umuntu siqu, kungenzeka singakwazi ukukuhlinzeka ngezinsizakalo ezithile. Noma kunjalo, ngeke sibe necala noma sithweswe icala ngokwenqatshelwa kwezinsizakalo ezithile ngenxa yokungahlinzeki kwakho ulwazi oludingekayo. Lapho ubhalisa kuhlelo lokusebenza noma Ezinsizeni, siyaxhumana nawe ngezikhathi ezithile mayelana nokuvuselela ulwazi lwakho siqu ukuze sikunikeze izici esikholelwa ukuthi zingakuzuzisa / zikuthakasele.
disclosure_tp_b_desp: Lapho sikhombisa ulwazi kubakhangisi bethu -- ukuze sibasize baqonde izethameli zethu futhi baqinisekise ukubaluleka kwezikhangiso kumawebhusayithi ethu noma Ezinhlelweni zokusebenza -- kuvamise ukuba ngendlela yezibalo ezihlanganisiwe zokuhamba kwamakhasi ahlukahlukene / okuqukethwe ngaphakathi kwamawebhusayithi noma Ezinhlelweni zokusebenza zethu. Sisebenzisa izinkampani zezikhangiso zomuntu wesithathu ukuhambisa izikhangiso lapho uvakashela amawebhusayithi noma izinhlelo zethu zokusebenza. Lezi zinkampani zingasebenzisa ulwazi (kuhlanganise negama lakho, ikheli, ikheli le-imeyili noma inombolo yocingo noma olunye ulwazi olukhomba umuntu siqu) mayelana nokuvakasha kwakho kuleli nasezinye izindawo ukuze zikunikeze izikhangiso zezimpahla nezinsizakalo ezikuthakazelisa. Asihlinzeki nganoma yiluphi ulwazi olukhomba umuntu siqu kumawebhusayithi / abakhangisi / abahlinzeki bezikhangiso bomuntu wesithathu ngaphandle kwemvume yakho.
disclosure_tp_d_desp: Sizokwabelana noma sidalule ulwazi lwakho siqu ngaphandle kwe-vrnl.net uma sinemvume yakho. Ngokwesibonelo, ukuhlinzeka ngezinsizakalo ze-SMS ne-E-mail ezifana nama-newsletter wokumaketha, ukukhushulwa nezipesheli.
disclosure_tp_f_desp: i-vrnl.net ingase idalule ulwazi olukhomba umuntu siqu uma kudingeka ngokomthetho noma ngokukholelwa okukhulu ukuthi isenzo esinjalo siyadingeka ukuze:
disclosure_tp_f_list:
• kuhambisane nemiyalo yomthetho noma kuthobele inqubo yomthetho enikezwe esizeni noma kubanikazi baso;
  • ivikele futhi ivikele amalungelo noma impahla yababanikazi besayithi, isayithi noma abasebenzisi be-vrnl.net;
  • Isebenze ngaphansi kwezimo eziphuthumayo ukuze ivikele ukuphepha komuntu siqu kwabasebenzisi be-vrnl.net, isayithi, abanini baso, noma umphakathi.
managing_info_desp1: Uma usebenzisa Izinsizakalo ezivela ku-moneycontrol (amawebhusayithi noma noma yiziphi izingxenye zawo), senza imizamo emihle ukukuhlinzeka, njengoba ucela, ukufinyelela ulwazi lwakho siqu futhi sizokuqinisekisa ukuthi noma yiluphi ulwazi lwakho siqu noma idatha yomuntu siqu olubucayi noma ulwazi olutholakala lungalungile noma lunokushoda luzolungiswa noma lushintshwe njengoba kungenzeka, ngokwesidingo sokugcina ulwazi olunjalo ngokomthetho noma ngenxa yezinjongo zebhizinisi ezisemthethweni.
managing_info_desp2: Sicela abasebenzisi ngabanye bazikhombe bona kanye nolwazi olucelwa ukuthi lufinyelelwe, lulungiswe noma lususwe ngaphambi kokucubungula izicelo ezinjalo, futhi singase senqabe ukucubungula izicelo eziphindaphindiwe ngokungafanele noma ezihleleke ngendlela efanayo, ezidinga umzamo wobuchwepheshe ongalingani, ezisongela ubumfihlo babanye, noma ebezimbi kakhulu ukusebenziseka (isib., izicelo mayelana nolwazi olusemathayipini wokulondoloza), noma lapho ukufinyelela kungadingeki khona. Noma kunjalo, lapho sihlinzeka ukufinyelela ulwazi nokulungiswa, senza lo msebenzi mahhala, ngaphandle uma ukwenza lokho kudinga umzamo ongalingani. Ngenxa yendlela esigcina ngayo ezinye izinsizakalo, ngemva kokuthi usususe ulwazi lwakho, amakhophi asele angathatha isikhathi esithile ngaphambi kokuthi asuswe kuseva zethu ezisebenzayo futhi angase ahlale ezinhlelweni zethu zokulondoloza.
managing_info_desp3: Ukuze usebenzise amalungelo asebenza kuwe njengomuntu onezibopho zedatha, kufanele usibhalele futhi uphakamise isicelo selungelo elishiwo. Sicela uqinisekise ukuthi usebenzisa izihloko ezifanele ukusho ilungelo (isb. Isicelo Sokufinyelela Idatha, Isicelo Sokuthutha Idatha, Isicelo Sokususwa Kwemininingwane) lapho uphakamisa zonke izicelo ezinjalo, lokhu kuzosisiza ukuthi sicubungule izicelo zakho ngokushesha nangendlela ephumelelayo.
managing_info_desp4: Sikunikeza ikhono lokusebenzisa izilawuli ezithile nezinketho mayelana nokuqoqwa kwethu, ukusetshenziswa nokwabelana ngolwazi lwakho siqu. Ngokuhambisana nomthetho osebenzayo, izilawuli nezinketho zakho zingafaka:
dataAccess_port_desp: I-EU - (General Data Protection Regulation) ikunikeza wena, njengomuntu othintekayo, ilungelo lokucela amakhophi olw Ulwazi Lwakho Siqu esinalo. Ungase futhi ube nelungelo lokucela amakhophi olw Ulwazi Siqu olunikeze kithi ngendlela ehlelekile, esetshenziswa kabanzi, futhi efundeka kumshini noma ukucela ukuthi sikudlulisela lolu lw Ulwazi komunye umhlinzeki wezinsizakalo (lapho kungenzeka ngokobuchwepheshe)
data_retention_desp1: Sigcina ulwazi lwakho siqu kuze kube isikhathi esidingekayo ngezizathu ezisemthethweni ezishiwo kule nqubomgomo futhi ukuze sihambisane nezibopho zethu zomthetho. Uma ungasafuni ukuthi sisebenzise ulwazi lwakho ungacela ukuthi sisuse ulwazi lwakho siqu futhi sivale i-akhawunti yakho ye-vrnl.net.
data_retention_desp2: Sicela uqaphele ukuthi uma isicelo sakho sokususwa kolwazi lwakho siqu;
data_retention_list:
• Singagcina olunye ulwazi lwakho siqu njengoba kudingekile ngezizathu zebhizinisi ezisemthethweni, njengokutholwa nokuvimbela inkohliso kanye nokwandisa ukuphepha. Ngokwesibonelo, uma simisa i-akhawunti ye-vrnl.net ngenxa yenkohliso noma izizathu zokuphepha, singagcina olunye ulwazi ngaleyo akhawunti ukuze sivimbele lowo msebenzisi ekuvuleni i-akhawunti entsha esikhathini esizayo.
  • Singase sigcine futhi sisebenzise ulwazi lwakho siqu lapho kudingekile ukuze sihambisane nezibopho zethu zomthetho. Ngokwesibonelo, singagcina olunye ulwazi lwakho ngezizathu zentela, ukubika okusemthethweni kanye nezibopho zokuhlola.
  • Ulwazi owabelane ngalo nabanye (isb., ukubuyekeza, okuthunyelwe efomini) lungaqhubeka lubonakale esidlangalaleni ku-vrnl.net, ngisho nangemva kokuthi i-akhawunti yakho ikhanseliwe. Kodwa-ke, ukubekwa kwakho kolo lw Ulwazi kuzokhishwa. Ngaphezu kwalokho, amanye amakhophi olw Ulwazi lwakho (isb., amarekhodi okuhlola) angahlala kudathabheyisi yethu, kodwa axhunywe emakhombandaba omuntu siqu.
  • Ngenxa yokuthi sigcina amakhophi olw Ulwazi lwakho siqu ukuze sivikele ekulahlekelweni noma ekucekelweni phansi ngokunganqikazi noma ngenhloso embi, amakhophi asele olw Ulwazi lwakho siqu angase angasuswa ezinhlelweni zethu zokulondoloza isikhathi esilinganiselwe.
data_retention_note: (Qaphela: Uma unama-akhawunti amaningi ku-moneycontrol, kuzodingeka uphakamise izicelo ezahlukene kuzo zonke lezo akhawunti, usebenzisa ama-imeyili ahambisanayo)
withdrawing_consent_desp: Ukuze urhoxise imvume yakho nganoma yisiphi isikhathi phakathi nesikhathi sokusebenzisa izinsizakalo zethu, ungakwenza ngokusithumelela i-imeyili. Sizobuyekeza isicelo sakho futhi singakucela ukuthi uqinisekise ubuwena. Ngemva kokuqinisekisa sizorhoxisa imvume yesicelo osenze futhi siyeke noma yikuphi ukucubungula olw Ulwazi lwakho siqu
fail_provideConsent_desp: Kuyisibopho sethu ukukwazisa ukuthi i-vrnl.net iyipulatifomu yokukhonza izikhangiso. Izikhangiso ziyisisekelo sebhizinisi lethu, ngakho-ke imvume yokusebenzisa nokucubungula imininingwane yakho yomuntu siqu ukuze sinikeze izikhangiso ibalulekile ukuze sikunikeze izinsiza. Ukusebenzisa imininingwane yomuntu siqu ekukhonzeni izikhangiso kuyisibopho esibophayo futhi ngeke sikwazi ukukunikeza izinsiza zethu uma wehluleka ukusivumela ukuthi sisebenzise imininingwane yakho yomuntu siqu ngenhloso yokukhonza izikhangiso kanye nemisebenzi ehlobene nayo.
childrens_privacy_desp1: i-vrnl.net ayiklanyelwanga ngenhloso noma iqondiswe kubantu abangaphansi kweminyaka engu-16. i-vrnl ayivumeli ngokuqondile noma ngokwazi noma yimuphi umuntu ongaphansi kweminyaka engu-16 ukuthi abhalisele izinsiza noma anikeze olunye ulwazi olukhomba mathupha. Uma i-vrnl ithola ukuthi imininingwane yomuntu engaphansi kweminyaka engu-16 iqoqa ku-vrnl.net ngaphandle kwemvume eqinisekisiwe yabazali, i-vrnl izothatha izinyathelo ezifanele zokususwa kwaleyo mininingwane bese yazisa umzali.
childrens_privacy_desp2: Nokho, sibheka njengomthwalo wemfanelo wabazali ukuqapha ukusetshenziswa kwezingane zabo ngezinsiza zethu. Noma kunjalo, kuyinqubomgomo yethu ukungaqoqi noma ukucubungula imininingwane yomuntu siqu yezingane ezingaphansi kweminyaka engu-16 noma ukunikeza izinto zokukhuthaza kulabo bantu. i-vrnl ayifuni futhi ayihlosile ukuthola imininingwane yomuntu siqu yezingane. Uma umzali noma umnakekeli enesizathu sokukholelwa ukuthi ingane inikeze i-vrnl imininingwane yomuntu siqu ngaphandle kwemvume yabo yangaphambilini, sicela uxhumane nethimba lethu lokusekela amakhasimende ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi imininingwane yomuntu siqu isuswe ku-vrnl.net.
data_transfer: VII. Ukudluliswa kwedatha, ukugcinwa & ukucutshungulwa emhlabeni wonke
data_transfer_desp: Sisebenza emhlabeni wonke futhi singadlulisela imininingwane yakho yomuntu siqu kwezinye izinkampani ezihlobene ne-vrnl noma kubantu besithathu ezindaweni ezahlukene zomhlaba ngenhloso echazwe kule nqubomgomo yobumfihlo. Noma ngabe imininingwane yakho yomuntu siqu idluliswa, igcinwa noma icutshungulwa yithi, sizothatha izinyathelo ezizwakalayo zokuvikela ubumfihlo bayo. Ngaphezu kwalokho, lapho sisebenzisa noma sidalula imininingwane yomuntu esuka ku-European Union, sisebenzisa izivumelwano ezijwayelekile ezivunyelwe yi-European Commission futhi samukela ezinye izindlela ngaphansi komthetho we-European Union ukuqinisekisa ukuvikeleka okwanele.
security_compliance_desp: Siyaqhubeka sifaka futhi sibuyekeza izinyathelo zokuphepha zokuphatha, zobuchwepheshe kanye nezomzimba ukusiza ukuvikela imininingwane yakho ekufinyeleleni okungagunyaziwe, ukulahleka, ukonakala, noma ukuguqulwa. Ezinye zezivikelo esingazisebenzisa ukuvikela imininingwane yakho zifaka ama-firewalls, ukufihla idatha, kanye nezilawuli zokufinyelela. Uma wazi noma unesizathu sokukholelwa ukuthi imininingwane yakho yokungena ku-akhawunti ye-vrnl.net ilahlekile, yebiwe, iguquliwe, noma yonakele noma uma kwenzeka noma usola ukusetshenziswa okungagunyaziwe kwe-akhawunti yakho, sicela uxhumane nethimba lethu lokusekela amakhasimende.
changein_policy_desp: Le Nqubomgomo Yobumfihlo ingashintsha ngezikhathi ezithile. Sigodla ilungelo, ngokuzimela kwethu, lokuguqula imigomo yale Nqubomgomo Yobumfihlo ukuze siqinisekise ukuhambisana nemithetho efanele ('Imigomo Ebukeziwe'). Imigomo Ebukeziwe izosebenza ngokushesha futhi izothatha indawo yale migomo. Sizokazisa nganoma yiziphi izinguquko uma lezo zinguquko zithinta kakhulu amalungelo akho noma njengoba kudingwa ngumthetho. Kuzoba ngumthwalo wakho kuphela ukuhlola le Nqubomgomo ngezikhathi ezithile ukuze uqaphele izinguquko. Ngokusebenzisa i-vrnl.net ngemuva kokushicilelwa kwemigomo ebukeziwe, uqinisekisa ukuthi uyayamukela imigomo ebukeziwe.
contact_info_a_desp: Uma udinga noma yiluphi ulwazi noma incazelo mayelana nokusetshenziswa kolwazi lwakho lomuntu siqu noma le nqubomgomo yobumfihlo noma izikhalazo ezihlobene nokusetshenziswa kolwazi lwakho, sicela usithumele i-imeyili ku
contact_info_b_desp1: Ungabhala kumphathi wokuvikelwa kwedatha uma unaso isikhalazo. Unelungelo lokukhalaza eminyangweni efanele yokuvikelwa kwedatha mayelana nemisebenzi yokucubungula edalwe yi-vrnl.net.
contact_info_b_desp2: Uma unemibuzo, izikhalazo mayelana nokuqoqwa, ukucubungulwa, ukudluliswa kolwazi lomuntu siqu noma mayelana nale nqubomgomo, sicela uxhumane noMqaphi Wedatha Wethu.
risk_management_title: Ukubheja Kwakho, Umthwalo Wethu – Ukuphathwa Kwezingozi Okungadlulwa
risk_management_title2: Inkampani eqhubeka ifuna izixazululo ezintsha ukuhlangabezana nezidingo zebhizinisi layo.
dedicated_rm_team_desp: Sine thimba elizinikele nelinolwazi olunzulu lokuphathwa kwezingozi elisebenza 24/7. Umsebenzi walo oyinhloko ukuqapha wonke amabheja kanye nokuthengiselana epulatifomu yethu ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukudlala ngokufanele kanye nokuphepha kwabo bonke abasebenzisi.
key_features_rm_list:
• Ukuqapha Ngokushesha: Izinhlelo ezithuthukile zilandela amabheja, izinguquko zamathuba, nomsebenzi wabasebenzisi ngokuqhubekayo.
  • Ukuhlolwa Ngesandla: Izexwayiso zivusa ukuhlolwa okujulile kwamaphethini okubheja, izinguquko zamathuba, nokuziphatha kwe-akhawunti.
  • Ukunciphisa Izingozi: Izinyathelo ezisheshayo njengokukhansela/ukumisa amabheja, ukuvimba ama-akhawunti, noma ukuqinisekisa abasebenzisi uma kutholakala okungajwayelekile.
  • Ukuhlaziywa Kwedatha: Ukuhlolwa okuqhubekayo kwedatha ebukhoma neyomlando ukuze kutholakale izitayela zezingozi nokuthuthukisa izindlela zokuvimbela.
  • Ukuphendula Ezinhlekeleleni: Uhlelo oluhleliwe lokusingatha ukwephulwa kwezokuphepha, ukukopela, noma ezinye izinsongo ngokushesha nangempumelelo.
benefits_rm_list:
• Ukuqeqeshwa Okuqhubekayo: Ukuthuthukiswa kwamakhono okuqhubekayo ethimba lezingozi ukuze likwazi ukubhekana nezinsongo ezintsha.
  • Ubuchwepheshe NobuPhepha Obuthuthukile: Izibuyekezo ezivamile, ukuhlolwa kokuvikeleka, izibuyekezo zesofthiwe, kanye nokuhlolwa kokuvikeleka.
  • Ubungcono: Ukuxhumana okucacile nabasebenzisi mayelana nezinyathelo zokuphathwa kwezingozi ukuze kugcinwe ukwethenjwa.
  • Ukunqoba Okuqhubekayo: Izindlela ezishintshayo ezisekelwe ezenzakalweni zangaphambilini nezinsongo ezisanda kuvela ukuvikela ubuqotho bepulatifomu kanye nezintshisekelo zabasebenzisi.
sbs_bold_p1: Ingabe usukulungele ukuthatha ulwazi lwakho lokubheja kwezemidlalo uye ezingeni elilandelayo? Ungabheki kude kune-VRNL Sports Betting Software! Kulesi sihloko, sizobheka ukuthi ubuchwepheshe buka-VRNL obuphambili bungashintsha kanjani indlela obheja ngayo. Ngokuhlangenwe nakho kweminyaka engaphezu kwamashumi amabili embonini, i-VRNL ungumlingani wakho othembekile wezixazululo zokubheja kwezemidlalo ezintsha. Ake singene emhlabeni wesoftware yokubheja kwezemidlalo futhi sithole ukuthi singalithuthukisa kanjani izinga lakho lokudlala.

disclosure_tp_a_desp:
a. Ukudalulwa Okuvamile
Ngezinye izikhathi i-vrnl.net ingenza ulwazi lomuntu siqu lutholakale kubalingani bamasu abasebenza ne-vrnl.net ukuhlinzeka ngezinsizakalo, noma abasiza i-vrnl.net ukuthengisa kumakhasimende. Ngokwesibonelo, uma uthenga bese uvula ukubhaliselwe, uyavumela i-vrnl.net ukuthi ishintshisane ngolwazi oluhlinzekwe ngesikhathi sokuvula ukubhaliselwe ukuze kuqhutshekwe insizakalo. Uma uvumile insizakalo, i-akhawunti yakho izolandela inqubomgomo yobumfihlo be-vrnl.net. Ulwazi lomuntu siqu luzokwabelwana ngalo yi-vrnl.net kuphela ukuze kunikezwe noma kuthuthukiswe insiza nezici zokumaketha zethu; aluzukwabelwana ngalo nezinhlangothi zesithathu ngenhloso yokumaketha kwabo.
I-vrnl.net ingakhetha ngokucophelela nezinye izinkampani ukuthumela ulwazi mayelana nemikhiqizo noma izinsizakalo zabo ezihlobene nenkonzo yesiza kodwa ezingabalulekile ekusebenzeni kwaso ('Insiza Ebandakanyisiwe'). Uma i-vrnl.net ihlose ukusebenzisa ulwazi olungaqondakali kumuntu siqu kule Nsiza Ebandakanyisiwe, iwebhusayithi ye-vrnl.net izokunikeza ithuba nemiyalelo edingekayo yokwenqaba le nsiza.
Ungaphinda uyeke ukuthola imilayezo yolwazi noma yokukhangisa evela ku-vrnl.net ngokulandela imiyalelo emilayezweni.
objection_processing_desp:
e. Ukuphikisana Nokucutshungulwa
Lapho ulwazi lwakho lomuntu siqu lusebenza ngenhloso yokumaketha okuqondile, ungalokhu usicela nganoma yisiphi isikhathi ukuthi siyeke ukucubungula idatha yakho yale nhloso yokumaketha okuqondile ngokuthumela i-imeyili kithi.
Sicela wazi ukuthi uma ungavumeli ukuba siqoqe ulwazi lomuntu siqu kuwe, kungenzeka singakwazi ukukunikeza ezinye izipiliyoni, imikhiqizo, nezinsizakalo, futhi ezinye zezinsizakalo zethu zingase zingakwazi ukubheka izintshisekelo zakho nezinto ozikhethayo. Uma ukuqoqwa kolwazi lomuntu siqu kuyadingeka, sizokwenza lokho kucace ngesikhathi sokuqoqwa ukuze ukwazi ukwenza isinqumo esinolwazi sokuthi uyafuna ukubamba iqhaza yini. Uma unemibuzo mayelana nolwazi oluthile lomuntu siqu esilucubungulayo noma olugcinayo, kanye namalungelo akho mayelana nalo, sicela uxhumane nethimba lethu lezokusekela amakhasimende.
disclosure_tp_e_desp:

Sinikeza ulwazi lomuntu siqu kuzakhamizi zethu kanye nezinye izinkampani ezithembekile noma abantu ukuze balucubungule kithi, ngokulandela imiyalelo yethu futhi ngokuhambisana nenqubomgomo yethu yobumfihlo kanye nanoma yiziphi ezinye izinyathelo ezifanele zobumfihlo nokuphepha. Ngokwesibonelo, singase sisebenzise abahlinzeki bezinsizakalo ukusisiza ngokusekela amakhasimende.
Uma i-vrnl ihlanganiswa noma ithengwa enye inkampani noma uma kwenzeka ukuhlelwa kabusha noma ukwakhiwa kabusha kwebhizinisi, thina kanye nezinkampani zethu esihlangene nazo singase sabelane ngolwazi lwakho lomuntu siqu, ngokuphelele noma ingxenye, nenye inhlangano yebhizinisi.
rectification_iii_desp:
b. Ukulungiswa Kolwazi Olungelona Lweqiniso Noma Olungaphelele
Ungasisela sicela silungise ulwazi lomuntu siqu olungelona lweqiniso noma olungaphelele oluthinta wena (lolu ulwazi ongakwazi ukuluvuselela ngokwakho ku-akhawunti yakho ye-moneycontrol) ngokuthumela i-imeyili kithi.
Ungakwazi ukufinyelela nokuvuselela ezinye zezinto zakho zomuntu siqu ngokusebenzisa izilungiselelo ze-akhawunti yakho. Uma ukhethe ukuhlanganisa iphrofayela yakho ye-vrnl.net nohlelo lokusebenza lomuntu wesithathu, njenge-Facebook noma i-Google, ungashintsha izilungiselelo zakho futhi ususe imvume ye-app ngokushintsha izilungiselelo ze-akhawunti yakho. Unomthwalo wokugcina ulwazi lwakho lomuntu siqu luhlale lusesikhathini. I-vrnl.net ingakuthumelela izikhumbuzo ngezikhathi ezithile nge-imeyili ukuze igcine ukunemba kolwazi lwakho lomuntu siqu.
disclosure_tp_c_desp:
c. Abahlinzeki Bezinsizakalo
I-vrnl.net ingase ifake izixhumanisi kumawebhusayithi ahlukahlukene omuntu wesithathu angase aqoqe Ulwazi Lwakho Lwomuntu Siqu. Ukusetshenziswa kolwazi lwakho oluqoqwe yilolu hlelo lomuntu wesithathu luzophathwa ngenqubomgomo yobumfihlo yale nkundla yomuntu wesithathu. Amawebhusayithi noma izinhlelo zokusebenza anqunywa yimithetho yobumfihlo yawo, okungaphandle kolawulo lwethu. Uma ushiya iziphakeli zethu (ungakwazi ukubona lapho ukhona ngokuhlola i-URL kubha yendawo yesiphequluli sakho), ukusetshenziswa kwanoma yiluphi ulwazi olunikeziwe kulawulwa yimithetho yobumfihlo yomlawuli wohlelo lokusebenza oluvakashelayo. Le mithetho ingahluka kolwaethu. Uma ungatholi inqubomgomo yobumfihlo yazo noma yisiphi salezi zingosi ngoxhumano olusuka ekhasini lasekhaya lohlelo lokusebenza, kufanele uxhumane ngqo nabanikazi bohlelo lokusebenza ukuze uthole ulwazi olwengeziwe.
Singakwazi ukwabelana ngolwazi olungahlonza umuntu siqu ngokuvamile futhi nabanikezeli bethu - njengabashicileli, abakhangisi, abathuthukisi, noma abanini bamalungelo. Ngokwesibonelo, sabelana ngolwazi obala ukuze sibonise izitayela zokusetshenziswa okujwayelekile kwezinsizakalo zethu. Siphinde sivumele abalingani abathile ukuthi baqoqe ulwazi kusiphequluli sakho noma kudivayisi yakho ngenhloso yokumaketha/ukuphromotha kanye nezilinganiso besebenzisa amakuki abo noma ubuchwepheshe obufanayo.
